Desc.entry: A registered charity offering a range of services for children and young people in the care system, eg independent people to help investigate complaints and advocates who visit children and young people in a range of residential care settings. Also advocates for young people looked after by the Council's Children and Young People's Service and acts as a signposting service for young people who need the help of an independent advocate. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 3050826.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
